document.full_text: the decision of the yugoslav war crimes tribunal in the hague was also an indirect verdict on the late president of croatia, franjo tudjman.
document.title: u.n. court convicts two croatian generals of war crimes and frees a third
lines_and_colors: the decision of the yugoslav war crimes tribunal in the hague was also an indirect verdict on the late president of croatia, franjo tudjman.
